T02D2284:139a-0: @139a # // bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad la btud de //
T02D2284:139a-1: lam 'bras gsung mdo bri bar bya //
T02D2284:139a-2: sems can la nyon mongs pa'i snang ba la ma dag pa'i snang ba /
T02D2284:139a-3: rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin la nyams kyi snang ba /
T02D2284:139a-4: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la dag pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D2284:139b-0: @139b kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'das chang bas rtsa rgyud /
T02D2284:139b-1: lus thabs rgyud sogs la gdan sogs gsum pa bzhi yis rgyu'i dbang /
T02D2284:139b-2: lam du bskyed rim la sogs lnga pa bzhis bstan /
T02D2284:139b-3: mnyam gzhag gi dam tshig sogs bsrung /
T02D2284:139b-4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs kyi nyams chags bskang /
T02D2284:139b-5: 'dod yon sogs lnga yis mnyes pa sogs bya /
T02D2284:139b-6: lam gyi thun bzhi la dbang bzhi bsgoms pas lus
T02D2284:139b-7: la brten nas bde chen gyi sgrib pa 'dag cing
T02D2284:139b-8: 'tshang rgya bar gsal bas bshad rgyud /
T02D2284:139b-9: phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud ni /
T02D2284:139b-10: 'bras bu'i dbang bzhis thams cad mkhyen to //
T02D2284:139b-11: tshad ma bzhis 'bras bu gtan la phab nas /
T02D2284:139b-12: 'gal 'dus skyon med sogs gsum gyis bsam gtan gyi dug dbyung /
T02D2284:139b-16: dangs ma lnga'i bde ba dar dbang po lnga nyams dang ma bral bas bdud rtsi bsten /
T02D2284:139b-20: sa thog mtha' la re re /
T02D2284:139b-21: gsum pa bcus bar gyi rtsa mdud dral bas la dor /
T02D2284:139b-22: 'jug pa sel ba'i lam yid 'dag pa'i rnam rtog bsgoms pas lta ba'i dug dbyung /
T02D2284:139b-23: rnam shes lngas yul lnga ma spangs pas /
T02D2284:139b-25: dag pa'i chos rnams gdod nas stong par shar bas la dor /
T02D2284:139b-26: gsang sngags snyan pa rgyud la sogs bzhi ma chad pas /
T02D2284:139b-27: lus khyad par can la brten nas dngos po'i mtha' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba /
T02D2284:139b-28: gzhan dbang rten 'brel byang chub chen po'i lam /
T02D2284:139b-29: chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lo rgyus kyis tshad ma'o //
T02D2284:139b-30: kun gzhi rnam shes dag pa'i byang chub chen po //
T02D2284:139b-31: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lnga yis lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2284:139b-32: thabs kyi phyogs su lhung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i lam gyi bar chad ni /
T02D2284:139b-33: dad pa brtan pos srung ba'i 'khor lo /
T02D2284:139b-36: chos rnams sems nyid snang ba /
T02D2284:140a-1: de kho na nyid rgya mtsho'i don dang ma bral bas bsrung /
T02D2284:140a-2: shes rab la phyi'i bdud lam gnyis /
T02D2284:140a-4: nang gi bdud lam la sogs bcu dang brda ma shes na 'od brda shes pas bsrung /
T02D2284:140a-5: grib dang sgrib pa thig le 'dzag pa bsrung //
T02D2284:140a-6: tshogs lam nas tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid dang bral bas bral ba'i 'bras bu bzhi thabs nas /
T02D2284:140a-7: khams 'du lugs gsum gyis phyogs med rnams dang /
T02D2284:140a-8: rlung sems bdag byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2284:140a-9: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun ltar lam bgrod na /
T02D2284:140a-10: sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni /
T02D2284:140a-13: thod rgal gyi ye shes kyi me 'bar bas /
T02D2284:140a-15: rgyun gyi rlung po lag ca can gyis rtsa dral ;
T02D2284:140a-19: sna tshogs 'dud la sogs bzhi rtsa ba'i rlung la
T02D2284:140a-20: sogs zin pa'i bye brag bdun gyis yan lag gi
T02D2284:140a-22: de tsa na thig le mang du kha 'bu /
T02D2284:140a-23: rten mnyam du 'dre de la brten nas sems nang du gnas /
T02D2284:140a-27: bsgom pa mi 'chor ba'i mthong snang rmi lam nyams
T02D2284:140a-28: gsum gsum ni rnam rtog sngon du song ba ltar
T02D2284:140a-29: khams gsum kun du snang ngo //
T02D2284:140a-30: sa chu la thim na smig rgyu /
T02D2284:140a-31: chu me la thim na du ba /
T02D2284:140a-32: me rlung la thim na srin bu me khyer /
T02D2284:140a-33: rlung rnam par shes pa la thim na mar me 'bar ba /
T02D2284:140a-34: rnam par shes pa 'od gsal la thim na nam mkha' sprin med lta bu /
T02D2284:140a-35: sa chu me rlung dang rlung sems mnyam par 'dus
T02D2284:140a-36: na khams gsum kun du me 'bar ba lta bur
T02D2284:140a-37: snang / chu rlung dang sbu lus grang /
T02D2284:140a-38: rlung gi rlung 'du 'phro dang rang 'phur bya 'byung /
T02D2284:140a-39: 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam rgyu dang lha mo sna tshogs kyis gang mchod dang dri ro /
T02D2284:140a-40: 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam rgyu dang lha mo sna
T02D2284:140b-0: tshogs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang @140b spu lus
T02D2284:140b-1: bde / bdud rtsi lnga dang bzhin gshegs sku sogs /
T02D2284:140b-4: rtsa bran rnams su thig phran dang skar ma /
T02D2284:140b-5: rtsa 'dzin la sogs su shing sdong la sogs /
T02D2284:140b-6: chags sdang rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2284:140b-8: mchi ma'i rtsar g-yal dang mchi ma /
T02D2284:140b-9: lte bar dang po chags pa'i rigs drug gi yi ger rlung sems mnyam par 'dus na /
T02D2284:140b-10: rigs drug gi gar sngags der khrid pa /
T02D2284:140b-11: rmi lam nyams lta bu khams gsum kun du snang ngo //
T02D2284:140b-12: aom las bsam gtan sogs kyi ting nge 'dzin yum gyi mkha'/
T02D2284:140b-13: aa las yang dag par thim na khams gsum nam
T02D2284:140b-14: mkha' yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2284:140b-15: phyin ma la sogs kyi pho brang du thim na
T02D2284:140b-16: chos sku nyams su myong zhing gzung 'dzin grol /
T02D2284:140b-17: h'um las gsal zhing yang la rang 'byung gi ye shes nam mkha' shin du dri ma med /
T02D2284:140b-18: khams 'dus pa bar pa rlung po lag ca bri bas rtsa dral /
T02D2284:140b-19: thig le'i gzugs dang mthong snang brten no //
T02D2284:140b-20: mdor na raksha la sogs su srin po sogs dri
T02D2284:140b-21: can gyi sgra lha'i mig rnam par dag pa bzhin
T02D2284:140b-22: / srid pa'i rtse mo man chad ting nge 'dzin gyi nyams su 'byung ba snyam byed pa /
T02D2284:140b-23: bshad kyis mi lang ba mtshon cing lnga bcu la gsang /
T02D2284:140b-24: bsgom pa mi 'chor ba'i phyi'i rten 'brel rlung log sogs gsum gsum ni /
T02D2284:140b-25: nang gi mkha' 'gro ma lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga /
T02D2284:140b-26: byang chub chen po'i rten 'brel mdzad pas /
T02D2284:140b-27: dngos grub rnams rang la 'byung bar shes shing re zhing stsol ba'i blo sel to //
T02D2284:140b-28: bdud dang gol sa rnams rang gi lam dang rten
T02D2284:140b-29: 'brel du shes pas skyon yon tan du bslang zhing
T02D2284:140b-30: rim pa yin min du skye ba'i dod byung rgyal
T02D2284:140b-31: du gtang / shes rab kyi phyogs su lhung ba'i lam la /
T02D2284:140b-32: lha'i bu'i bdud 'ong pas sad pa bzhis bsrung /
T02D2284:140b-33: sgom pa mi 'tsher ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni /
T02D2284:140b-34: yul 'gags pas rang yi dam gyi lha ldang /
T02D2284:141a-0: gug skyes kyi dgos pa bsam zhing ting @141a * //
T02D2284:141a-2: khams 'dus pa tha ma rlung po lag ca dral bas rtsa bral /
T02D2284:141a-3: skye mched drug gi nang du thig le 'dus pas rjes su dran pa drug yang dag par shes /
T02D2284:141a-5: sgom pa mi 'tshor ba'i yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni /
T02D2284:141a-6: sprul sku las dbang gsum gyi rdzas las byung ba'i shes pa bsam zhing /
T02D2284:141a-7: dgyes sogs pang can bcu gnyis ma'i rtsa btsal zhing /
T02D2284:141a-8: snying po'i aa kun 'dar gyi sna rtser dal rgyu la sogs rig pa yid 'jug pas /
T02D2284:141a-9: lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje dkyil krung bcas /
T02D2284:141a-10: thig le rlung non pas rnga sgra la sogs mi thos pas /
T02D2284:141a-11: chog shes pa sogs kyi bdud choms pa'o //
T02D2284:141a-12: nang gi sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam srid pa'i rtse
T02D2284:141a-13: mor phyin cing ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod dka'
T02D2284:141a-14: bstod pa nyid kyi bzod pa'o //
T02D2284:141a-15: dbu mar sems rtog med log sems 'phos na bzod pa /
T02D2284:141a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam chos rnams rdzogs pas chos rnams kyi nang na mchog go //
T02D2284:141a-18: de ltar nyams skyon can skyon med dang /
T02D2284:141a-19: phyi dbyibs kyi aa nas yar rlung sems mnyam par
T02D2284:141a-20: 'dus nas lam du 'byung ba rnams ngo bo rang
T02D2284:141a-21: mtshan nyid do // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la /
T02D2284:141a-22: phyi nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lam gyis
T02D2284:141a-23: sprul sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed
T02D2284:141a-24: pa / spyod pa'i rim pa'i lam nas lus dag par byad pa bum pa'i dbang mthar phyin /
T02D2284:141a-25: de kho na nyid kyi rtags /
T02D2284:141a-26: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni /
T02D2284:141a-27: rtsa rin po che'i 'pho brang bzhi /
T02D2284:141a-28: gtso bo gsum ste lus kyi dkyil 'khor mthong bas rtog pa'i 'gro ldog byed /
T02D2284:141a-29: sprul sku'i zhing khams brgya bsgul zhing nyan /
T02D2284:141a-33: ting nge 'dzin mi 'dra ba brgya la snyoms par 'jug nus /
T02D2284:141a-34: rigs drug gi rtsar khyad par du mi'i rten mthong nas dga' la g-yang za /
T02D2284:141b-0: sngon @141b bla mas rgyu dus na bstan pa'i 'khor
T02D2284:141b-1: 'das dbyir med de tsa na rtog snying rje skye
T02D2284:141b-3: gzhan gyi sems sna tshogs shas /
T02D2284:141b-4: 'dod yon sna tshogs mthong bas dgod bro //
T02D2284:141b-5: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs skad cig mas 'byung ba rnams nang gi zhing khams mthong bas so ;
T02D2284:141b-6: ; nang ma mthong bar phyi mi mthong /
T02D2284:141b-7: de tsa na ling ga brtan /
T02D2284:141b-8: rdo rje rtser ldan cig skyes pa'i sar thig le gnas pa ltar /
T02D2284:141b-9: lus bde ba sa myos shing brgyal /
T02D2284:141b-12: phyi rtags gsang gnas phyed thig les brtan sa dang po'o //
T02D2284:141b-13: yang sprul sku las dbang bzhi sgom lam sa gnyis
T02D2284:141b-14: pa nas sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams stong la sogs
T02D2284:141b-15: pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus /
T02D2284:141b-23: yang longs sku las dbang bzhi bzhi bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i lam nas /
T02D2284:141b-24: longs sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa /
T02D2284:141b-25: ngag dag pa gsang ba'i dbang mthar phyin /
T02D2284:141b-26: de kho na nyid kyi rtags dbang po lnga dang dangs ma'i rlung lnga la mnga' brnyes /
T02D2284:141b-27: nus pa lnga dang lta stang sa rnams la thogs pa med /
T02D2284:141b-28: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor du rigs drug gi sa bon mthong /
T02D2284:141b-29: sa bon drug la mnga' brnyes /
T02D2284:141b-30: sems can rnams kyi skad du chos ston cing chos
T02D2284:141b-31: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la thogs pa med
T02D2284:141b-32: / lte bar yi ge'i phyi mo brgyad /
T02D2284:141b-33: a'a li k'a li mthong nas /
T02D2284:141b-34: mdo sde'i chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la thogs pa med /
T02D2284:141b-35: bdud rtsi lnga dang ro drug la longs spyod nus /
T02D2284:141b-36: tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gyur pa rnams aa ni yig 'bru ces pa drug gis gsal lo //
T02D2284:141b-37: sa bdun yan chad longs sku'i zhing khams 'khor bzhi'i
T02D2284:141b-38: brgya dung phyur la sogs bsgul ba la sogs pa
T02D2284:142a-0: nus / nang rtags rlung sor bcu @142a * //
T02D2284:142a-2: phyi rtags mgrin smin thig les brtan /
T02D2284:142a-5: sems dag la dkyil 'khor lo thabs kyi lam nas
T02D2284:142a-6: chos sku rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed
T02D2284:142a-7: pa / shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang mthar phyi na /
T02D2284:142a-8: de kho na nyid kyi rtags /
T02D2284:142a-10: byang chub kyi sems kyi rlung lnga bskyod pa'i dangs ma'i dangs ma /
T02D2284:142a-11: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas rtags bstan pa /
T02D2284:142a-12: sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs dbang thob nas /
T02D2284:142a-13: bdud rtsi lnga gar 'du mthong nas sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don mdzad pa mthong /
T02D2284:142a-14: sprul pa bde chen thig le 'du ba mthong na /
T02D2284:142a-15: sangs rgyas rnams 'og min gyi gnas na zab mo la bzhugs pa mthong /
T02D2284:142a-16: lte ba sprul par bdud rtsi lnga dang rlung lnga 'dus pa mthong na /
T02D2284:142a-17: longs sku'i rigs lnga yum gyi bha ga na bzhugs
T02D2284:142a-18: nas skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' la gsang ba
T02D2284:142a-19: sgrogs pa mthong / phyag rgya ma'i dangs ma'i dangs ma mthong na mngon shes la thogs pa med /
T02D2284:142a-20: rtsa yig rnams su dangs ma 'drongs na rdzu 'phrul la thogs pa med ;
T02D2284:142a-21: de nyid slar spos na sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran /
T02D2284:142a-22: nang rtags rlung sor bcu gnyis 'gags /
T02D2284:142a-23: phyi rtags spyi gtsug hri la thig les brtan /
T02D2284:142a-25: yang dbang bzhi bzhi mthar phyin gyi lam nas mthar thug rten 'brel mthar thug 'da' ba /
T02D2284:142a-26: rdo rje'i dpa' rlabs kyi lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub rig ma'i skyes bu /
T02D2284:142a-27: srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam //
T02D2284:142a-28: ngo bo nyid kyi sku rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed pa /
T02D2284:142a-29: bzhi pa lus ngag yid kyi dbang mthar phyin /
T02D2284:142a-30: de kho na nyid kyi rtags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni /
T02D2284:142a-31: rnam shes brgyad 'dag kar 'bras bu gnyas thob ste /
T02D2284:142a-32: sa chen dga' zhing rangs la mgu //
T02D2284:142a-33: de rnams pa drug tu g-yo //
T02D2284:142a-34: bdud gnas su sgra grag phyag rgya ma'i gnas su khams gsum mthong /
T02D2284:142b-1: ha ri ma la sogs pa dbang phyug gi don brgyad 'char /
T02D2284:142b-2: nang rtags srog rtsol aa wa dh'u t'ir 'jug phyi rtags gtsug tor phyed thig les brtan /
T02D2284:142b-3: sa phyed dang bcu gsum mo //
T02D2284:142b-4: bzhi pa yid kyi dbang mthar phyin /
T02D2284:142b-5: de kho na nyid kyi rtags 'bras bu'i phyogs gcig 'thob ste /
T02D2284:142b-6: 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings //
T02D2284:142b-8: 'bras bu longs sku'i zhing khams rab bkram la sogs pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus /
T02D2284:142b-9: sa bcu gsum thob kar sa bcu ma la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste /
T02D2284:142b-10: slob dpon dus gsum bde gshegs bcud 'dus yin /
T02D2284:142b-11: yi dam lha dang bla ma dbyer med la //
T02D2284:142b-12: bha gar dngos grub len pa'i rten 'brel gyis //
T02D2284:142b-13: srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam //
T02D2284:142b-14: ngo bo nyid kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag
T02D2284:142b-15: pa rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed pa
T02D2284:142b-16: / 'bras bu mthar phyin de kho na nyid kyi
T02D2284:142b-17: rtags longs sku'i zhing khams ma lus pa la sogs
T02D2284:142b-18: pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus /
T02D2284:142b-19: nang rtags srog rtsol aa wa dh'u t'i 'i 'gags /
T02D2284:142b-20: phyi rtags gtsug gtor hril thig les brtan /
T02D2284:142b-21: phye nang gi rten 'brel 'gros bzhi thim pa rnams
T02D2284:142b-22: kyis sgom nyams kyis skyon yod med phyed pas bcu
T02D2284:142b-23: gsum pa'o // thams cad mkhyen te /
T02D2284:142b-24: bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin sar rten 'brel 'grig pa ltar snang /
T02D2284:142b-25: 'tshang rgya kar 'khor tshom bu cig dang bcas te 'tshang rgya'o ;
T02D2284:142b-26: / gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni //
T02D2284:142b-27: rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dbang //
T02D2284:142b-28: rtogs pas brtags pas rtog med rtogs //
T02D2284:142b-29: ye shes snang ba de bzhin no //
T02D2284:142b-30: lam zab bla ma dam tshig lus so sor brtags
T02D2284:142b-31: pa'i 'gog pa lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams
